title: Question: Do limited time skins ever come back?
body: Im generally new to the LoL community as Ive only played for a few months and Ive come across skins in game that I would just love to buy but are no longer available in the store and I was wondering do we ever get a chance to purchase these limited time skins again or did you just have to be around at the time of sale to get a hold of the skin

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We have both limited and legacy skins. 

Legacy skins will periodically come back to the store. Examples of these are Kitty Kat Katarina, or Poro Rider Sejuani. Limited skins are removed once the event is over, and there is no guarantee they'll return to the store/be made available again. These would include skins such as Rusty Blitzcrank, Championship Riven and Victorious skins (Jarvan, Janna, Elise, Morgana). 

You can find the full list of both legacy and limited skins [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).

A year ago a Rioter said it might be possible for CS Riven to be re-released given the amount of time she wasn't available.

Is it still being considered or shelved like everything ever?

Yup! [Hippalus](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/H004gAPw-ecommerce-qa?comment=00350002) did say there's a possibility. :] 

 *"Yes I think Championship Riven will come back someday. Most limited edition skins took four years to come back after release, and it's been two years for Riven so far."*

As far as I know, the statement still stands.

I'm fine with it so long as I get that snazzy icon, border, and refund :) I get those, others get the skin, everybody wins.

Thats great to know since a lot of the Legacy skins were on my skin wishlist, but can you please clarify whether the World Championship winners such as Fnatic and SKT skins are Legacy or Limited as well as skins such as Championship Thresh and Shyvana
Sure! Championship Thresh and Shyvana are legacy, as well as the commemorative Championship team skins, such as SKT, SSW, etc.
Thats great to hear I can't wait for the days they are made reavailable

Depends whichs ones you're looking for. Harrowing-Halloween Snowdown-Christmas and General Legacys comeback atleast once a year.

Some come back occassionally (like Halloween skins) And some are retired perma or were only gettable through an event (like the PAX skins)

You just have to watch for when they put the legacy ones on sale :P

Limited skins will be brought back [again] if Riot thinks the $$$ they earn by re-releasing those skins will outweigh the backlash that betraying their customers [again] will cause.

Legacy skins can be brought back at any time, but will almost always be tied to a special legacy sale or a bundle.
